attributes.action: Stop the Free Movement Directive for the uk
attributes.additional_details:
We want to stop the Directive 2004/38/EC known as the Free Movement Directive set up by the EU to allow diversity free access to the UK.
The UK implemented this by the Immigration (European Economic Area) Regulations 2006 (The EEA Regulations).

We also want to stop the 55% of non EU  diversity that is coming into the UK.
Why are we allowing so many in, when we have shortages of housing, healthcare and jobs?
Why are the three main parties so blind to the trouble this is causing?

And why does the EU rule the roost when it comes to running our own country!
We want the government to take decisive action in stopping the migrants coming to the UK!
